sourcing.instructions: 1. Europium Oxide - Purchase from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces specializing in rare earth materials.
steps: 1. Europium Oxide - Purchase from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces specializing in rare earth materials.
1. Weigh out 100 grams of Europium Oxide and 24 grams of Sulfur using an analytical balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 100 grams of Europium Oxide and 24 grams of Sulfur using an analytical balance.

steps: 1. Turn off the oven and allow the sample to cool down to room temperature inside the oven (approximately 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the oven and allow the sample to cool down to room temperature inside the oven (approximately 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. Inspect the solid sample for any surface imperfections.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Inspect the solid sample for any surface imperfections.
